channel.title: 0.4.9 on ReactOS Website
channel.description: Recent content in 0.4.9 on ReactOS Website

item.title: ReactOS 0.4.9 released
item.description: The ReactOS Project is pleased to announce the release of version 0.4.9, the latest in our accelerated cadence targeting a release every three months. While a consequence of this faster cycle might mean fewer headliner changes, much of the visible effort nowadays comes in the form of quality-of-life improvements in how ReactOS functions. At the same time work continues on the underlying systems which provide more subtle improvements such as greater system stability and general consistency.
